meanings.definition: The state or quality of being convex.
meanings.sent1: The convexities of the mirror distorted my reflection.
meanings.sent2: The artist carefully highlighted the convexities of the sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The funhouse mirror exaggerated the convexities of my face.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, bouncing off the convexities of the walls.
meanings.sent5: The convexities of the hill made it challenging to climb.
